text: Hakan Yavuz (born 1 June 1960 in Istanbul, Turkey) is a Turkish professional basketball coach, who is now coaching Denizli Basket. ==References== ==External links== * Hakan Yavuz Interview and Career Category:1960 births Category:Living people Category:Galatasaray S.K. (men's basketball) coaches Category:Turkish basketball coaches
title: Hakan Yavuz
